content:
Candidates for the next UTA president underwent interviews Monday and Tuesday and the Search Advisory Committee set a general time line for selecting a finalist UT System spokeswoman Jenny LaCosteCaputo said PERIOD

The 17member committee is in the process of narrowing down the field of  candidates and will conduct another round of interviews in late November or early December LaCosteCaputo said in an email PERIOD

The goal is to have a finalist for the Board of Regents to consider by February but that timeline depends on how the interviews go she said in the email PERIOD

Per state law names of candidates may not be released to the public until the finalist is named PERIOD

President James Spanioloannouncedhis plans to retire in June but said he will remain in his role until a successor is chosen PERIOD

KristaMTorralva

krista.torralvamavs.uta.edu

Vistasp Karbhari has been named the lone finalist for the UTA president PERIOD Karbhari is provost and executive vice president for academic affairs
